verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Children of the heavenly Father safely in his bosom gather; nestling bird nor star in heaven such a refuge e'er was given.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: Neither life nor death shall ever from the Lord his children sever; Unto them His grace h showeth, And their sorrows all he knoweth.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Praise the Lord in joyful numbers, Your proteteor never slumbers; At thew ill of your Defender Ev'ry foe-- man must surrender.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Though He giveth or he taketh God His children ne'er forsaketh; his the loving purpose solely to preserve them pure and holy.
